titles: The saints sacrifice: or, a commentarie on the CXVI. Psalme Which is, a gratulatory psalme, for deliverance from deadly distresse. By William Gouge, D.D.
author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.
publisher: Printed by George Miller for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible, at the great north doore of Pauls,
notes: Apparently intended to be issued with his "Workes", 1639, but not present in any known copy.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
